comment: Literally the biggest waste of my time yet. Did literally nothing but talk about bridges and the wright brothers, literally every single class. He gave nearly the same lecture every class, verbatum. If you want an easy class for credit and be able to get other coursework done, this is your class. If you wanted to learn something, find someone else

I tried to add tags but there is nothing to describe him. I mean, I don't know how he got into ksu but jeez. We were not even sure to have a final! Don't take him. Even if you are looking for easy A's, having class woth him is a pain. He is so random and scatterbrained. He doesn't have the notion of time. I dont have enough space BUT DONT TAKE HIM!
Earl is mah boii , take him , you don't have to go to class and you get that easy A. Gang gang
